{{Description|Thieves that come and go like the wind, though they only do so out of pure instinct.<br />No one knows which whimsical person it was who trained these animals to steal with such obsessive zeal. Weasel thieves will go around stealing and hoarding Mora &mdash; whether it be change on traveling guests, adventurers' expenses, or even treasure from within ruins, none escape their sight.<br />From the state of the purses on these Amateur Weasel Thieves, they seem to have only been able to grab some loose change left by travelers...|in-game description from the [[Archive]]}}
'''Amateur Weasel Thief''' is a type of [[Weasel Thief]] which can be found as a [[Wildlife]].

When chased after being investigated, Weasel Thieves will continuously drop a stream of 1 [[mora]] until slain by the player.

==Drops==
{{Card|Mora|500}}

Catching one for the first time will add this creature's entry into your in-game [[archive]].
